EmailTemplate.name: ENG-Multi Hypervisor/Hyper-V-Nurture.ENG-Mult-Hypervisor-Early-01.01-Hypervisor-
EmailTemplate.subject: The Hypervisor Wars - Which Hypervisor Rules The Roost?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[http://turbonomic.com/blog/on-technology/the-hypervisor-wars-which-hypervisor-rules-the-roost/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=eng-mult&utm_content=earl01]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, You may be shocked to hear that in the world of virtualization VMware is the current heavy weight champion of the world. But the competition is heating up as multiple challengers are starting to gain traction. The main competitors are Microsoft's Hyper-V and OpenStack. But how viable are these new hypervisors? And which one makes the most sense for you? Click below to read more and figure out who rules the roost <[[http://turbonomic.com/blog/on-technology/the-hypervisor-wars-which-hypervisor-rules-the-roost/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=eng-mult&utm_content=earl01]]> -The Turbonomic Team
